alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 09 at 7:31AM AKDT until July 09 at 9:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues to be possible. * WHERE...The following area, Chilkat River. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Backyards along the Chilkat River in the village of Klukwan may start to flood and impact some smoke houses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Unusually warm daytime temperatures into the 70s and 80s through the Sunday may accelerate snow and glacier ice melt in the Chilkat River basin. River levels are expected to remain near bankfull and that may start to cause issues for areas around Klukwan Sunday morning and afternoon. Highest water levels are expected Sunday morning. There is uncertainty on how high the river will get with the possibilities ranging from the bankfull conditions to minor flooding in some areas. - If you live near or along Chilkat River stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
